A B C E G H I L M N P R S T U Z

A

address - Variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.Multicast
A reference to the address on which this object is operating.
announce(Remote, int) - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.Multicast
This method is used to make announcements on the network.

B

BaseItem - class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseItem.
A standard base class for server items.
BaseItem.MainThread - class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseItem.MainThread.
The main processing thread of this Item.
BaseItem.MainThread() - Constructor for class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseItem.MainThread
The constructor performs no function, as the class is abstract.
BaseItem() - Constructor for class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseItem
The constructor does nothing, server item configuration is be done by application specific subclasses.
BaseProxy - class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy.
A standard abstract base class for proxy objects.
BaseProxy.MainThread - class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy.MainThread.
The main processing thread of this Item.
BaseProxy.MainThread() - Constructor for class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy.MainThread
Nothing is performed in the constructor.
BaseProxy.Panel - class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy.Panel.
A standard base class for graphical proxy objects.
BaseProxy.Panel() - Constructor for class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy.Panel
Nothing is performed in the constructor.
BaseProxy() - Constructor for class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy
Nothing is performed in the constructor.
bind(Object, String, boolean, Multicast) - Static method in class gnu.cajo.utils.ItemServer
The generic bind operation remotes an item in the local rmiregistry.
bind(Object, String, boolean, Multicast, Object) - Static method in class gnu.cajo.utils.ItemServer
The generic bind method is used to serve the provided proxy item by the provided server item.
bundle - Variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy
The path/filename of the resource bundle in the proxy's jar file.

C

checkPermission(Permission) - Method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.NoSecurityManager
In accordance with the SecurityManager paradigm, this method simply returns, to indicate that a requested client operation is permitted.
Client - class gnu.cajo.invoke.Client.
This class is used to create a hosting VM to receive graphical proxy objects from a remote VMs.
Client() - Constructor for class gnu.cajo.invoke.Client
The default constructor does nothing.
CodebaseServer - class gnu.cajo.utils.CodebaseServer.
The standard mechanism to send proxies, and other complex objects to remote VMs.
CodebaseServer(String, int) - Constructor for class gnu.cajo.utils.CodebaseServer
Construction will start up the server's codebase transport mechanism.
config(String, int, String, int) - Static method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Remote
This method configures the class' TCP parameters for RMI.
container - Variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy
A reference to the proxy's graphical user interface, if any.

E

equals(Object) - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.MonitorItem
This method is overridden here to ensure that two different monitor items holding the same target item return true.

G

getAppletInfo() - Method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Client
This method provides the standard mechanism to identify this applet.
getClientHost() - Static method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Remote
This method is provided to obtain the host name remote clients must use to contact this server.
getClientPort() - Static method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Remote
This method is provided to obtain the socket port number the remote client must use to contact the server.
getItem(String) - Static method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Remote
A utility method to load either an item, or a zipped marshalled object (zedmob) of an item, from a URL, file, or from a remote rmiregistry.
getParameterInfo() - Method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Client
When running as an applet, this method is describes the optional client applet perameters.
getPreferredSize() - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy.Panel
This method simply returns the actual size of the component.
getProxy() - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseItem
This method is called by the remote clients, to request the item's proxy item, if it supports one.
getServerHost() - Static method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Remote
This method is provided to obtain the server's host name.
getServerPort() - Static method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Remote
This method is provided to obtain the local server socket port number.
gnu.cajo.invoke - package gnu.cajo.invoke
This package is the foundation for transparent local/remote inter-VM communication.
gnu.cajo.utils - package gnu.cajo.utils
A set of common utilities used by either proxy, or server items.

H

hashCode() - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.MonitorItem
This method is overridden here to ensure that two different monitor items holding the target item return the same value.

I

iaddr - Variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.Multicast
A reference to the address of the calling VM, when the object is listening.
init() - Method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Client
When running as an applet, this method will connect back to its hosting server and request its proxy server from its rmiregistry.
Invoke - interface gnu.cajo.invoke.Invoke.
The generic inter-component communication interface, and foundation for this paradigm.
invoke(String, Object) - Method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Remote
The sole generic, multi-purpose interface for communication between VMs.
invoke(String, Object) - Method in interface gnu.cajo.invoke.Invoke
Used by other items to pass data into this item, and receive synchronous data responses from it, if any.
invoke(String, Object) - Method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Client
A utility method to load a proxy items into this VM.
invoke(String, Object) - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.ZippedProxy
The interface to the proxy wrapper.
invoke(String, Object) - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.ProxyLoader
This function may be called reentrantly, so the inner item must synchronize its critical sections as necessary.
invoke(String, Object) - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.MonitorItem
This method logs the incoming calls, passing the caller's data to the internal item.
invoke(String, Object) - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy
This function may be called reentrantly, so critical methods must be synchronized.
invoke(String, Object) - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseItem
This function may be called reentrantly, so critical methods must be synchronized.
item - Variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.Multicast
A reference to a received item, when the object is listening.
ItemServer - class gnu.cajo.utils.ItemServer.
These routines are used for item server construction.
ItemServer() - Constructor for class gnu.cajo.utils.ItemServer
Nothing happens in the constructor of this class, as all of its methods are static, and it has no instance variables.

L

listen(Invoke) - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.Multicast
This method starts a thead to listen on the construction address on the construction port.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Remote
The application method loads a zipped marshalled object (zedmob) from a URL, or a file, and allows it run in this virtual machine.
main(String[]) - Static method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Client
The application creates a remotely accessible proxy hosting VM, bound in its own rmiregistry under the name "main".
main(String[]) - Static method in class gnu.cajo.utils.Multicast
The application method loads a zipped marshalled object (zedmob) to a proxy from a URL, or a file, and allows it run in this virtual machine.
main(String[]) - Static method in class gnu.cajo.utils.ItemServer
The application loads either a zipped marshalled object (zedmob) from a URL, a file, or alternately, it will fetch a remote item reference from an rmiregistry.
mob - Variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseItem
A reference to the proxy served by this item.
MonitorItem - class gnu.cajo.utils.MonitorItem.
This class is used to instrument an item for invocation logging purposes.
MonitorItem(Invoke, OutputStream) - Constructor for class gnu.cajo.utils.MonitorItem
This creates the monitor object, to instrument the target item's use.
Multicast - class gnu.cajo.utils.Multicast.
This class can listen for UDP multicasts over the network, as well as to send out UDP announcements.
Multicast() - Constructor for class gnu.cajo.utils.Multicast
The default constructor sets the internal fields to default values which should be sufficient for most purposes.
Multicast(String, int) - Constructor for class gnu.cajo.utils.Multicast
The full constructor allows creation of Multicast objects on any appropriate address, and port number.

N

NoSecurityManager - class gnu.cajo.invoke.NoSecurityManager.
This utility class creates a trivial SecurityManager for developing proxy hosting clients.
NoSecurityManager() - Constructor for class gnu.cajo.invoke.NoSecurityManager
Nothing is performed in the constructor.

P

paint(Graphics) - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy.Panel
The paint method is overridden to directly paint its components.
payload - Variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.ZippedProxy
The compressed serialized proxy object.
port - Variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.Multicast
A reference to the port on which this object is operating.
port - Static variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.CodebaseServer
This is the local inbound ServerSocket port number providing the http data and codebase jar service.
proxy - Variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.ZippedProxy
A reference to the internal proxy object, before serialization at the server, and when decompressed on arrival at the host.
ProxyLoader - class gnu.cajo.utils.ProxyLoader.
This class is used to avoid having to load proxies into the VM runtime of the proxy server.
ProxyLoader(String) - Constructor for class gnu.cajo.utils.ProxyLoader
The constructor creates a small wrapper object referencing a proxy item solely by name, but not loading it into the server's VM runtime.

R

rcsf - Static variable in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Remote
A global reference to the remote client socket factory.
registry - Static variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.ItemServer
The reference to the sole local rmiregistry of this VM.
Remote - class gnu.cajo.invoke.Remote.
This utility class takes a object, and allows it to be called from remote VMs.
Remote(Object) - Constructor for class gnu.cajo.invoke.Remote
The constructor takes an object, and remotes it for calling.
RemoteInvoke - interface gnu.cajo.invoke.RemoteInvoke.
The Remote Component Communication Interface, and reason for this package.
remoteThis - Variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy
A remote reference to the proxy itself, which it can send to its server, or other remote VMs on which they can asynchronously callback.
rssf - Static variable in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Remote
A global reference to the remote client server factory.
run() - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.Multicast
The monitor thread, it listens for multicasts.
run() - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy.MainThread
The run method is exectued by the thread created for the BaseProxy at its initialization at the client, and runs until it returns.
run() - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseItem.MainThread
The run method is exectued by the Thread created for the BaseItem, and runs until it returns.
runnable - Variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy
A reference to the proxy's processing code.
runnable - Variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseItem
A reference to the item's processing code.

S

send(String) - Method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Remote
This method sends its remote reference to another item, either from a URL, file, or from a remote rmiregistry.
server - Variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy
The reference to the sending server, on which the proxy may asynchronously callback.
setProxy(Invoke) - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseItem
This method is called by remote clients to install a proxy in this VM.
strings - Variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy
The collection of strings to be displayed at the host VM.

T

thread - Variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy
The processing thread of the proxy object, it will be started automatically upon arrival at the host when the init method is invoked.
thread - Variable in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseItem
A reference to the item's processing thread.
toString() - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.ProxyLoader
This method is used to identify the contents of the ProxyLoader.
toString() - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.MonitorItem
This method is overridden here to provide the name of the internal object, rather than the name of this object.

U

update(Graphics) - Method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Client
The update method is short-circuited to directly execute the paint method, to reduce flicker from the default background repainting.
update(Graphics) - Method in class gnu.cajo.utils.BaseProxy.Panel
The update method is overridden to directly invoke the paint method.

Z

zedmob(InputStream) - Static method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Remote
A utility method to reconstitute a zipped marshalled object (zedmob) into a remote item reference.
zedmob(OutputStream) - Method in class gnu.cajo.invoke.Remote
This method will write the remote item reference to an output stream as a zipped marshalled object (zedmob).
ZippedProxy - class gnu.cajo.utils.ZippedProxy.
This class is used to transfer a zipped marshalled object (zedmob) of its internal proxy item.
ZippedProxy(Invoke) - Constructor for class gnu.cajo.utils.ZippedProxy
The constructor retains the reference to the proxy, until the server reference is provided, after that, it is serialized into the payload array, and discarded.
